subject: Football
Women and Girls
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Welter and Sarah Thomas, the N.F.L.’s first full-time female referee, are part of an evolving league that seems to be acknowledging its diverse fan base.
snippet: Welter and Sarah Thomas, the N.F.L.’s first full-time female referee, are part of an evolving league that seems to be acknowledging its diverse fan base.
